# C++ Test Repository

## Files

- `main.cpp`: C++ features including namespaces, classes, templates, inheritance

## Expected AST Entities

### Functions
- `add`
- `multiply`
- `maximum` (template)
- `main`

### Classes
- `Person`
- `Container` (template)
- `Employee` (derived from Person)

### Methods (Person)
- Constructor
- Destructor
- `getName`
- `getAge`
- `setName`
- `setAge`
- `greet`

### Methods (Container)
- `add`
- `get`
- `size`

### Methods (Employee)
- Constructor
- `getJobTitle`
- `work`
